description: This data set contains known and probable spring locations as determined by review of U.S. Geological Survey topographic maps and field verification. It depicts the location of the feature as a point. For more information see http://www.dnr.mo.gov/env/wrc/springs.htm.

metadata.attribution: Missouri Geological Survey Geo-Sciences Technical Resource Assessment Tool

name: Springs
